original_title: Second phase of the 3rd school term to commence
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The second phase of the third school term of 2023 will commence on Monday (05) for government and government-approved schools.
The Ministry of Education said the second phase of the third term will end on the 16th of February.
The first school term of 2024 is scheduled to commence on the 19th of February.
